meanings.definition: A mark or impression made on the back of a piece of pottery or porcelain indicating the manufacturer or origin.
meanings.sent1: The backstamps on the vase showed it was made in Italy.
meanings.sent2: Collectors often look for backstamps to identify the age of ceramics.
meanings.sent3: The backstamps on the teapot played a game of hide and seek with the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a backstamp, leaving a lasting impression on everyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The backstamps on the plates were like secret codes waiting to be deciphered.

meanings.definition: To mark or stamp the back of something with a design or information.
meanings.sent1: She carefully backstamps each letter she sends to make them unique.
meanings.sent2: The artist backstamps his paintings with a tiny signature in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child backstamps his toys with imaginary logos.
meanings.sent4: His kindness backstamps his character, leaving a positive mark on everyone he meets.
meanings.sent5: The chef backstamps each dessert with a delicate chocolate decoration.
